Secure the indwelling needle.sentence: The nurse prepares the indwelling needle for insertion.
Secure the indwelling needle.subject: The nurse

Secure the indwelling needle.sentence: The nurse selects an appropriate site for the needle insertion.
Secure the indwelling needle.subject: The nurse

Secure the indwelling needle.sentence: The nurse cleans the selected site with an antiseptic solution.
Secure the indwelling needle.subject: The nurse

Secure the indwelling needle.sentence: The nurse inserts the indwelling needle into the vein at the cleaned site.
Secure the indwelling needle.subject: The nurse

Secure the indwelling needle.sentence: The nurse secures the indwelling needle in place with adhesive tape.
Secure the indwelling needle.subject: The nurse
